TopicTitle: A KSP movie/video idea: The Lost Mun Base

Articles.Content:
Ok so I have been thinking for a while about making a movie sort of thing, and I just wanted to get some peoples opinions on it here is a very rough outline:

The crew of Xenon III, a munar base, has lost connection due to a scheduled radio black out for some minor repairs, and two hours over due, the KSC radios them and they do not answer. Unaware that a crew member from a previous failed mission, whom they thought was dead[and he felt as if he was abandoned and wanted revenge], had killed all of the crew of Xenon III, and has hijacked their space ship, and disabled the tracking beacon ,and is headed to kirbin to attempt and de-orbit Kerbal Space Lab IV and make it land on KSC as revenge for abandoning him in space.

Now like I said, its a very rough outline, and I will add many more details, but I appreciate if you tell me what you think, what should be changed, and if you might check it out.

Thanks!

Agent Orange
